hero.title: Arquers Club Castelldefels
hero.subtitle: Precision and Tradition
hero.description: Archery club in Castelldefels with over 25 years of experience. Join our community of Catalan archers and discover the ancient art of sport archery.
hero.detailedDescription: We offer archer training courses, specialized training in recurve bow, compound bow, traditional bow and barebow, and activities for all ages. From beginners to Olympic competitors, we develop your technique in the sport of archery.

courses.title: Training Courses
courses.description: Learn archery from scratch with officially approved ROPE instructors

location.title: Castelldefels Location
location.description: Shooting range equipped with the latest technology in Catalonia

community.title: Archer Community
community.description: Join tournaments, competitions and archery activities in Barcelona

about.title: Arquers Club Castelldefels
about.subtitle: Archery Club in Catalonia since 1998
about.description1: The Arquers Club Castelldefels is a sport archery club located in Castelldefels, Barcelona, with more than 25 years of experience in archer training and the practice of archery in Catalonia.
about.description2: We offer archery courses for beginners and specialized training in recurve bow, compound bow, traditional bow and barebow. Our instructors certified by the Catalan Archery Federation and the Royal Spanish Archery Federation guarantee quality training in the Olympic sport of archery.

features.certifiedDescription: Trainers officially approved by ROPE and years of experience
features.facilitiesDescription: Recurve bow, compound, traditional and field archery

programs.title: Archery Initiation Course
programs.subtitle: Federated sport by the Catalan Archery Federation and the Royal Spanish Archery Federation. We offer certified training at the Olympic Canal of Catalonia facilities. All equipment and insurance during classes are included.

beginner.title: Initiation Course - Adults
beginner.description: Federated sport requiring aptitude certificate. Complete course for adults with training in barebow, instinctive, traditional and recurve/Olympic archery.
beginner.enrollAriaLabel: Enroll in the adult initiation course

junior.title: Initiation Course - Junior
junior.description: Specialized course for youth from 15 years old. Complete training with certified instructor at the Olympic Canal facilities.

freeClass.title: Free Promotional Class
freeClass.description: As is customary in our club, we offer a free promotional class so you can experience the sport directly before starting the course.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Interested in becoming part of Arquers Club Castelldefels? Contact us for more information about our archery courses.

footer.description: Arquers Club Castelldefels is your archery club in Catalonia. Join our community of archers and discover the passion for the sport of archery.

accessibility.scrollDown: Scroll down to see more content

seo.metaTitle: Arquers Club Castelldefels - Archery Club in Catalonia | Courses and Training
seo.metaDescription: Archery club in Castelldefels with more than 25 years of experience. Training courses, specialized training and activities for all ages. Discover archery in Catalonia!
